tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE geospatial_data (
    geospatial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    location_name TEXT,
    data_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE mapping_data (
  map_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name TEXT,
  route_description TEXT,
  start_location TEXT,
  end_location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE navigation_data (
  user_id INT,
  route_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  distance DECIMAL,
  CONSTRAINT navigation_pk PRIMARY KEY (user_id, route_id)
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
	location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	location_name VARCHAR(255),
	latitude FLOAT,
	longitude FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE routes (
	route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	start_location_id INT,
	end_location_id INT,
	route_name VARCHAR(255),
	distance FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE users (
	user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	user_name VARCHAR(255),
	email VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
	vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	vehicle_name VARCHAR(255),
	vehicle_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE waypoints (
	waypoint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	route_id INT,
	location_id INT,
	waypoint_order INT
)
